alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Schoharie; Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 3:46PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A line of showers with gusty winds and brief heavy rainfall will impact portions of southwestern Fulton, north central Schoharie, southeastern Herkimer and Montgomery Counties through 430 PM EST... At 345 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking showers along a line extending from near Dolgeville to near Cooperstown. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and brief heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roads. Locations impacted include... Gloversville, Johnstown, Canajoharie, Fonda, Fort Plain, St. Johnsville, Ephratah, Sharon Springs, Ames, Tribes Hill, Glen, Charleston, Warren, Fultonville, Palatine Bridge, Nelliston, Ingham Mills, West Perth, Cook Corners and Church Corners. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 28 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
